/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban jungle. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with advertisements that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the energy and dynamism of the city.
